doc:
Essence Atkins https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Essence_Atkins 0 Essence Uhura Atkins (born February 7, 1972) is an American actress and model. She began her career appearing on television sitcoms, before regular role on the short-lived first African-American prime-time soap opera Under One Roof (CBS, 1995). Atkins is best known for her roles on television comedies. From 1997 to 1999, she starred as Tasha Yvette Henderson in The WB sitcom Smart Guy. She later went to star as Dee Dee Thorne in UPN sitcom Half Half (2002–06) and TBS comedy series Are We There Yet? (2010–12) as Suzanne Kingston-Persons. In film, Atkins has appeared in Deliver Us from Eva (2003), Dance Flick (2009), A Haunted House (2013) and A Haunted House 2 (2014). Essence_Uhura_Atkins ( born February_7_,_1972 ) is an_American_actress_and_model . She began her_career appearing on television_sitcoms , before regular_role on the_short-lived_first_African-American_prime-time_soap_opera Under One_Roof_(_CBS , 1995_) . Atkins is_best_known for her_roles on television_comedies . From 1997 to 1999 , she starred as Tasha_Yvette_Henderson in The_WB_sitcom Smart_Guy . She later went_to_star as Dee_Dee_Thorne in UPN_sitcom_Half_(_2002 – 06_)_and_TBS_comedy_series Are We There Yet ? (_2010 – 12_) as Suzanne_Kingston-Persons . In film , Atkins has_appeared in Deliver_Us from Eva_(_2003_) , Dance_Flick_(_2009_) , A_Haunted_House_(_2013_) and A_Haunted_House_2_(_2014_) .
